com.deliveredtechnologies.rulebook

Class Fact<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.deliveredtechnologies.rulebook.Fact<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NameValueReferable<T>

    public class Fact<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements NameValueReferable<T>
    A Fact is a single piece of data that can be supplied to a Rule. Facts are not immutable; they may be changed by rules and used to derive a result state.
